  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent (e.g., AMD FX-6300)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6770)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Ensure that all drivers are up-to-date for the best gaming experience.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU with at least 2 GB of VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Ensure that all drivers are up-to-date for the best gaming experience.

  • Processor: 2.5 GHz

  • Additional Notes: Unity requires a Display and/or Window Manager (example: Gnome Display Manager, X11 Window Manager) for mouse input to work under Linux. Some distros come pre-equipped with them (example: Mint), some don’t, and some come with Unity-unfriendly ones (example: Ubuntu's default window manager).
